```{r, setup, include=FALSE}
# functions
source(here::here("R", "fx_react_tbl.R"))
source(here::here("R", "fx_react_tbl_div.R"))
```

```{r, read, include=FALSE}
ed_grp <- readRDS(here("data", "grouped_ed_diags.rds"))
ip_grp <- readRDS(here("data", "grouped_ip_diags.rds"))

# ED
ed_dat <- ed_grp |>
  filter(grpnm == "Late presentation of chronic conditions") |> 
  select(diagnm, p2, u) |>
  arrange(desc(u))

# inpatient
ip_dat <- ip_grp |>
  filter(grpnm == "Late presentation of chronic conditions") |> 
  select(diagnm, icd10, p2, u) |>
  arrange(desc(u))

short_nms <- tribble(
  ~ icd10, ~ shortnm,
  "D500", "Iron def. anemia second. to bld loss chronic",
  "R935", "Abnormal finding diagn. imag. abdo. region",
  "E878", "Oth. disorders electrolyte & fluid balance nec"
)

ip_dat <- ip_dat |> 
  left_join(short_nms, by = "icd10") |> 
  mutate(shortnm = ifelse(is.na(shortnm), diagnm, shortnm)) |> 
  select(shortnm, p2, u) |> 
  rename(diagnm = shortnm)
```

```{r, react-tbl-ed, echo=FALSE}
tbl <- build_react_tbl(ed_dat, units = "Visits", colwidth = c(240, 200, 200))

react_tbl_div(tbl, selector = "rtbl-grp-ed", title = "Table 6: ED diagnoses linked to late presentation of chronic conditions")
```

```{r, react-tbl-ip, echo=FALSE}
tbl <- build_react_tbl(ip_dat, units = "Admis.", colwidth = c(240, 200, 200))

react_tbl_div(tbl, selector = "rtbl-grp-ip", title = "Table 7: Inpatient diagnoses linked to late presentation of chronic conditions")
```
